name: Foursquare
description:
Extract zip file, open Windows folder and open FoursquarePrototype.exe!

Controls:

ActionXbox Controller (recommended!)
Keyboard and MouseJumpASpaceSprintLeft Trigger Left ShiftCrouchLeft Stick Button Left ControlPick Up/DropBETossRight TriggerLeft Mouse ButtonHitX Right Mouse ButtonHoming DashYCAim LeftLeft Bumper GAim RightRight BumperHReset StartR

To exit, please manually close the window via the taskbar using the Windows key or Task Manager.

AI does not work, just a rough proof of concept for ball physics and character actions.
